tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE stolen_personal_info (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  full_name VARCHAR(100),
  address VARCHAR(255),
  social_security_number VARCHAR(20)
)
CREATE TABLE personal_information (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name TEXT, address TEXT, social_security_number TEXT)
CREATE TABLE credit_card_info (id INT PRIMARY KEY, card_number TEXT, expiration_date TEXT, cvv TEXT)
CREATE TABLE personal_information (id INT, name VARCHAR, address VARCHAR, ssn VARCHAR);
CREATE TABLE credit_cards (id INT, card_number VARCHAR, expiration_date VARCHAR, cvv VARCHAR, owner_id INT);
CREATE TABLE addresses (id INT, address VARCHAR, city VARCHAR, state VARCHAR, postal_code VARCHAR);
CREATE TABLE contacts (id INT, name VARCHAR, phone_number VARCHAR, email VARCHAR, address_id INT);
